name: Landsknecht
description:
Use the left & right "ARROW" keys to move.
Use "SPACE" to jump.
Use "X" to slash with your sword.

Help Victoria defeat the Gargoyle in the old cathedral of Nachtburg and claim the piece of St. Martin's cloak. A Castlevania and Dark Souls inspired boss battle.

I made this game for a university project at the end of my first semester.
If you like it consider following me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/shellrider_game or buying me a coffee: https://ko-fi.com/shellrider.

Want to get a message whenever I release something new: signup to my mailing list on: shellrider.com

Intro screen music by Ivy Fae licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0
